segments.text: Hi , good morning , Miss ? what can I help you with ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good morning I'd like to mail this box of books to Taiwan .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , please put it on this scale.Airmail or by sea ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How long does it take to reach Taiwan by sea ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's too long.How long does it take to reach Taiwan by airmail ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then how much is that by airmail ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me see.It ' s 57 dollars , 20 cents , including tax .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Although it's expensive to send it by airmail , it's quicker and safer than by sea .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I guess I have to send it by airmail .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you want to ensure the contents , Miss ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please fill out this form , also please write the value of the items in this space .
segments.speaker: S1
